items.name: Burger of The Month

items.name: The Mighty Bastard
items.description:
(1KG) Challenge
Dare to face it alone or share it with your friends , our bastard is 1 KG burger patty loaded with cheese caramelized onions , chili con cane , crispy onion & tortilla strips , lettuce , pickles and our special sauce 
(Dare to finish it alone  in less that 30 min , and enter our wall of fame )
